data.system_settings: MacBook Pro (15-inch, 2017) macOS High Sierra version 10.13.1
data.actual_result: The user does not see the messages sent in the channel in between when they lost and regained access to the channel
data.expected_result: The user will be able to see all chat history of the channel
data.short_description: If a user with access to a role exclusive channel has their role revoked, all messages sent directly after are not seen once a user regains access again.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a Role Exclusive Channel - Send test message - Revoke a users role - Send another test message - Grant same user the role and access again
